q1: Will France repeat in next World Cup?
a1: They have a great chance with a young squad. However, a lot of teams can make the same claim.
q2: What teams do you think can beat France?
a2: I think that Brazil has a good chance of beating France.
q3: When was the last time Brazil won?
a3: They last won in the 2002 World Cup.
q4: How many times has France won the World Cup?
a4: Two times! They have always been a strong team
q5: Who is the goaltender for France?
